body.p: The Practice Statement sets out a non‑binding framework to guide the presentation of management commentary. The Board’s intention in issuing the Practice Statement is to foster good practice in management commentary reporting by permitting an entity’s management to exercise discretion in tailoring its commentary to the entity’s particular circumstances.
